source_objects.title: Microsoft
source_objects.description: Become proficient in Microsoft tools: Windows, Sharepoint, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, Project and more.

items.title: Microsoft 365 Mobility and Security (Exam MS-101)
items.headline: Learn topics from the Microsoft MS-101 exam
objectives_summary: Implement modern device services
Implement Microsoft 365 security and threat management
Manage Microsoft 365 governance and compliance

items.title: Microsoft Excel Dashboard Infographics Masterclass Volume 1

visible_instructors.job_title: Computer Engineer, SSMBB, PRINCE2, SAP CRM, Lean Expert
visible_instructors.name: Suhas
visible_instructors.title: Suhas Dakhole

items.headline: Learn the Art of converting your Dashboards and Charts into Creative,Innovative and Professional Looking Infographics.
objectives_summary: Taking this course will be the best decision you will make as you will not only take your MS Excel Skills to a different level but also you will be an expert in creating attention-grabbing MS Excel infographics that you can use in your next presentation, your website or your social media campaign or anywhere you want.

items.title: Excel 2010 Introduction
items.headline: All you need to know to unleash the power of Excel spreadsheets
objectives_summary: Create the framework of a basic worksheet
Build formulas and work with basic functions
Edit a worksheet

items.title: Microsoft Excel Engineering (Part 1)

visible_instructors.job_title: President - Innovative Institution, Professor of Engineering
visible_instructors.name: Manish
visible_instructors.title: Manish Narayan

items.headline: Spreadsheet Engineering
objectives_summary: Transform Excel into an engineering tool that will help solve real world problems in various industries
Gain knowledge in Excel and Visual Basic for Applications (VBA)
Create Structured Spreadsheet Designs

items.title: Learn Microsoft Flow
items.headline: Learn how to use Microsoft Flow and the important features
objectives_summary: Learn how to use Microsoft Flow and all the important features.
Learn about the types of flows and how to run a flow.
Learn how to create flows from a template.

items.title: SharePoint 2010 Introduction
items.headline: Unleash the power of Microsoft's web application platform, including document and content management
objectives_summary: Understand the potential of SharePoint
Navigate a site
Create and edit a team site

items.title: Microsoft Project: The Full Course - Become an Expert Today

visible_instructors.job_title: Project Management Consultant and Instructor, 20+ Years Exp.
visible_instructors.name: Tony
visible_instructors.title: Tony Agront, PMP, MBA

items.headline: Everything You Need to Learn Microsoft Project Today! Bonus and extra lessons from the very Basics to Advanced skills.
objectives_summary: Learn all You Need to Manage Your Project Using Microsoft Project
Create Your Own Project Plan using Microsoft Project
Add and Manage Resources within Your Project

items.title: Learn Microsoft Excel 2013 - Advanced
items.headline: Insider Method: Learn Advanced Techniques for Microsoft Excel 2013 Fast - Without Lectures, Books, or Night Classes
objectives_summary: Working with dates and times
Averages, percentiles, and LINEST functions
Calculating depreciation

items.title: Microsoft Office 2010 Made Easy
items.headline: An easy step-by-step course that will help anyone master the basics of Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Access.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to understand the role of computers in business and the home, identify the moral and ethical issues related to the use of personal computers, recognize the basic structure of and navigate around Microsoft Office 2010 software applications and develop knowledge and skills of computer applications through guided hands-on video tutorial sessions and assigned activities.

items.title: Microsoft Excel: Pivot Tables, Power Query, Power Pivot/DAX

visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor - over 350,000 students so far
visible_instructors.name: Phillip
visible_instructors.title: Phillip Burton

items.headline: Microsoft Excel Pivot Tables, Get and Transform (Power Query) and Power Pivot (DAX) for advanced data analysis. 70-779.
objectives_summary: Be able to create PivotTables and PivotCharts, both basic and advanced
You will be able to format numbers and dates, and create advanced calculations.
You will be able to Get and Transform multiple sources of data, including merging multiple files from a folder, pivoting and unpivotting.

items.title: PowerPoint: The Complete Step X Step PowerPoint Course! 6HR
items.headline: Learn PowerPoint Step x Step With PowerPoint Screen-share & Learn By Doing Fast! For 2013, 2010, & 2016, 365 PowerPoint!
objectives_summary: Create PowerPoint slide decks in an easy and fast manner so they can focus on their presentations or other items in their worklife
Use all the features of PowerPoint and know when to use each item properly and quickly
Create presentations that are visually appealing and communicate your ideas without distractions from poor slide design

items.title: Working with InfoPath 2013 in SharePoint
items.headline: Get a comprehensive overview of InfoPath 2013
objectives_summary: Understand how to use InfoPath within SharePoint
Work with List Forms
Create a Data Souce

items.title: Control Your Day - Microsoft Outlook Email Mastery System
items.headline: A New Approach to Email Management Using Microsoft Outlook and the best practices of David Allen's Getting Things Done
objectives_summary: A new way to manage email and tasks using Microsoft Outlook and the best practices of Getting Things Done.

items.title: MS Office 365 For Beginners: Fast Track Training
items.headline: Learn how to master MS Office 365 methods quickly and easily for yourself or business
objectives_summary: How To Easily Master MS Office 365
How To Optimize MS Office 365 For Best Results
Brand New Over-The-Shoulder Video Series For MS Office 365

items.title: Fundamentals of Microsoft PowerApps
items.headline: Build mobile and web-based business apps without the need to write a single line of code
objectives_summary: Learn how to use PowerApps
Build basic business apps without any development skills.
Learn how to quickly create and share apps using data from SharePoint, Excel, Dynamics, and Salesforce.

items.title: Microsoft Excel Bootcamp - Learn to Master Excel in 3hrs!
items.headline: In this fun and engaging course, you'll master keyboard shortcuts, VLOOKUPs, IF statements, PivotTables, and more!
objectives_summary: Learn Excel in a fun, interactive, and entertaining manner (no sleeping in this course)
Wow your team with powerful formulas such as VLOOUP, IF, SUMIFS, and more!
Gain powerful insights into your data using PivotTables and Slicers
